title: Gerrit Smith (rugby union)
text:
Gerhardus Phillipus Johannes "Gerrit" Smith (born 12 February 1988 in Pretoria) is a South African <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who last played for the in the <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> and in the <a href="Rugby%20Challenge%20%28South%20Africa%29">Rugby Challenge</a>. He is a utility back and can play as a <a href="Fly-half%20%28rugby%20union%29">fly-half</a>, <a href="Centre%20%28rugby%20union%29">centre</a>, <a href="Winger%20%28rugby%20union%29">winger</a> or <a href="Full-back%20%28rugby%20union%29">full-back</a>.
Career.
Youth and amateur.
He represented the team in the 2007 Under-19 Provincial Championship competition and for the team in the 2008 and 2009 Under-21 Provincial Championship competitions.
He also played several seasons of <a href="Varsity%20Cup">Varsity Cup</a> rugby – he played for in the <a href="2008%20Varsity%20Cup">2008</a> and <a href="2010%20Varsity%20Cup">2010</a> competitions and for in the <a href="2012%20Varsity%20Rugby%23Varsity%20Cup">2012</a> and <a href="2013%20Varsity%20Cup">2013</a> competitions.
Falcons.
He made his first class debut for the in the 14–95 defeat to the in the <a href="2009%20Currie%20Cup%20First%20Division">2009 Currie Cup First Division</a>. This turned out to be his one and only appearance for them.
SWD Eagles.
After his spell playing for the , he joined <a href="George%2C%20Western%20Cape">George</a>-based side the before the <a href="2013%20Currie%20Cup%20First%20Division">2013 Currie Cup First Division</a> season and made his debut for them in the first match of the season against the .
